teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Billiard Enthusiasts
teams.loan_because:
Please join me!
We all loan for our own reasons.  But we like the notion of promoting billiards worldwide while helping the Kiva borrowers.
There are often borrowers who own pool rooms or pool tables as part of their business plan, or would like to.  We're here to help them.
teams.description: Enthusiasts who enjoy any of the many pocket and cushion billiard games.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about the suffering of human beings.
teams.description:
We know we are one human family.
